backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access‑controlled user profiles and chat storage with queries and updates for managing chats and messages.
feature_evidence.json: Report mapping responsive and mobile‑ergonomics features to the files, components, and tests that implement them.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend source file related to chat UI, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining color tokens, dark mode variables, and global element styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component orchestrating authentication, chat state, autosave, message sending, and responsive layout integration.
frontend/src/components/AuthButton.tsx: Authentication button handling login/logout with responsive icon and label behavior.
frontend/src/components/ChatComposer.tsx: Message input component with mobile‑friendly sizing and Enter‑to‑send behavior.
frontend/src/components/ChatHistoryPanel: Sidebar panel listing chats with selection, creation, and delete‑confirmation dialogs, optimized for touch targets.
frontend/src/components/ChatMessage.tsx: Renders a chat message with conditional styling and avatar based on whether it is from the user or assistant.
frontend/src/components/DeveloperSafetyN: Displays a collapsible developer warning about API key exposure and recommended security practices.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Shows a dialog for entering and saving a user's name, handling validation, backend updates, and error states.
frontend/src/components/ResponsiveChatHi: Provides a responsive chat history panel with a mobile drawer and desktop sidebar for selecting, creating, or deleting chats.
frontend/src/components/SafetyUsage.tsx: Presents safety and usage guidelines with alerts explaining content policies and acceptable interactions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useChatAutosave.ts: Handles loading and saving chat messages either to the backend when authenticated or to local storage when anonymous.
frontend/src/hooks/useChats.ts: Provides hooks for listing chats, fetching a single chat, and creating, deleting, or adding messages via the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches the current user's profile from the backend when authenticated.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity state, login, logout, and status helpers. Initializes AuthClient with custom options and restores stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a React Query mutation to send a message to the backend actor and refresh the messages list on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and custom OKLCH-based theme variables for light and dark modes, plus base and utility styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loading global styles.
frontend/src/types/chat.ts: Declares the UIMessage interface representing a chat message with role, content, and timestamp.
frontend/src/utils/chatLocalStore.ts: Implements localStorage-backed chat persistence, including loading, saving, selecting, and clearing chats.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, container settings, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Describes project metadata, features, restrictions, and known issues including safety notes and API key warnings.
